1340940.name: SEQUENCE STORM - Jelly's Raceway Expansion Pack
1340940.description:
This pack contains:

Six new tracks!
  • Peak by Young Jaguar
  • Remember Sailor by 2DCAT
  • Hardcase by special player
  • Cellophane by Endochrome
  • When You're Away - a SEQUENCE STORM original track
  • Is This Real? by SOTUI & NIKITA

Seven new story missions! Available in act 1 of the game.

Unlock two new passive items!

A new unlockable rig skin!

13 new set pieces for use in your own tracks!
  • Geometric track
  • Mesh track
  • Geometric buildings 1 2, and 3
  • Geometric turn arrows
  • Geometric rail
  • Geometric terrain river
  • Geometric terrain mountains
  • Geometric clouds: large/medium/small
  • Geometric skybox

10 soundtrack versions of the tracks!
  • Cellophane
  • Cellophane - short edit
  • Hardcase
  • Is This Real? (2019 Gamesize Mix)
  • Peak
  • Peak - short edit
  • Remember Sailor
  • Remember Sailor - short edit
  • When You're Away
  • When You're Away - short edit
1340940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
